mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from Board_Notice where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
select DISTINCT BN_NUM, BN_SUBJECT, BN_CONTENT, to_char(BN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BN_DATE from Board_Notice where BN_NUM = #{BN_NUM}
mapper.insert: insert into Board_Notice (BN_NUM, BN_SUBJECT, BN_CONTENT, BN_DATE) values (#{BN_NUM}, #{BN_SUBJECT}, #{BN_CONTENT}, sysdate)
